price: Kandi Allah azi ibyo muhisha n’ibyo mugaragaza.
arabic: وَٱللَّهُ يَعۡلَمُ مَا تُسِرُّونَ وَمَا تُعۡلِنُونَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: wal-lahu yaʿlamu mā tusirrūna wamā tuʿ'linūna
